name: Labyrinth (itch) (Asura200)
description:
Navigate through two labyrinth levels while killing/avoiding the enemies.

Controls:

A Key: Move Left
D Key: Move Right
W Key: Move Forward
S Key: Move Backward
Z Key: Retry Level 1 (in game over screen)
X Key: Retry Level 2 (in game over screen)
C Key: Exit the game (in game over screen)
Left Mouse Click: Shoot
Shift Key: Run
Spacebar Key: Jump
